headline: Uber to Acquire Parking App SpotHero
summary: SAN FRANCISCO & CHICAGO, February 23, 2026--Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) and SpotHero, Inc. today announced that they have reached an agreement for Uber to acquire SpotHero, bringing parking reservations onto the Uber app.

headline: Uber’s new autonomous vehicle division is about survival and opportunity
summary: Uber Autonomous Solutions will see the company taking on all the tasks associated with operating a robotaxi, self-driving truck, or sidewalk delivery robot business.

headline: Uber Autonomous Push Raises Questions On Valuation Gap And Growth Potential
summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) has launched Uber Autonomous Solutions, a new platform focused on autonomous vehicles for ride-hailing and delivery. The platform is designed to support global deployment and commercialization of robotaxis and self-driving delivery services. Uber Autonomous Solutions offers partners tools such as insurance, real-time mission control, fleet operations support, in-car experiences, complex venue management, and regulatory assistance. For investors watching the...

headline: Uber CEO predicts most rides could be robot operated within 20 years
summary: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said business leaders must begin to contend with the encroaching AI job displacement wave.

headline: Software, Payments Shares Tumble After Citrini Post on AI Risks
summary: DoorDash Inc., American Express Co. and Blackstone Inc all slumped more than 7%.  Shares of other companies name-checked in the article, including Uber Technologies Inc., Mastercard Inc., Visa Inc, Capital One Financial Corp., Apollo Global Management Inc. and KKR & Co. Inc. were all lower by at least 3%.

headline: Dystopian AI report sinks DoorDash, software stocks
summary: Investing.com -- DoorDash shares fell 7% on Monday, while Uber dropped 3%, Salesforce declined 4%, MongoDB slid 6%, and ServiceNow lost 4%, following publication of a dystopian scenario analysis from Citirini Research examining potential risks from rapid AI advancement. Visa and Mastercard also declined, falling over 2%.

headline: Uber Unveils Uber Autonomous Solutions to Accelerate Autonomous Mobility & Delivery Worldwide
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, February 23, 2026--Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) today announced the launch of Uber Autonomous Solutions, a comprehensive suite of unique services and capabilities that are already helping partners to build and successfully commercialize autonomous vehicles in multiple markets around the world.
